description:
How many Pokémon are there? If you've lost track over the years, you're not alone - after 9 full generations, the total is now into quadruple figures, and that's not even including regional variants, mega-evolutions, and alternate forms. Luckily, Wargamer's keeping track for you - read on for the full total, broken down by generation.

Continue reading How many Pokémon are there in 2024?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Trading Card Games, Best Pokémon
title: How many Pokémon are there in 2024?

description:
Warhammer 40k Ork players and actual Warhammer 40k Orks have one thing in common - they love to build unique, ramshackle devices from piles of scrap. Long-time Ork collector Dave Gormley took that attitude to heart when he built ‘Da Kommand Gubbin’, a custom turn and points tracker to use alongside his Dread Mob army.

Continue reading This Warhammer 40k points tracker is the Orkiest prop we’ve ever seen
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warhammer 40k ,
title: This Warhammer 40k points tracker is the Orkiest prop we’ve ever seen

description:
These Foundations Jumpstart Magic: The Gathering cards are reaching ridiculous figures, with significant price spikes after the set’s launch. Rev, Tithe Extractor and Scythecat Cub are the two most expensive creatures in the set, and both have defied expectations by shooting up in value after launch. Scythecat Cub has gone from $35 to $65 since November 15, while Rev, Tithe Extractor has risen from an already high $70 to an astounding $91.

Continue reading Foundations Jumpstart MTG cards hit
title: Foundations Jumpstart MTG cards hit absurd prices, with $30 rise post launch

description:
As the festive season approaches, anticipation fills the air and we begin to fantasize about the best Lego Christmas sets and presents. We particularly love the Lego Christmas tree – but all of the sets in this guide bring joy and wonder.

Lego is a timeless gift that's brought joy to all ages since its inception. Our picks showcase our favorite Christmas-themed sets and the best sets for holiday gifts. For more options, read our list of the absolute best Lego sets for adults, or even the
title: Best Lego Christmas sets for gifts

description:
RPG publisher Kobold Press has issued an apology to its fans for two articles on its website that unfavorably compare the DnD Player’s Handbook and Dungeon Master’s Guide to its own equivalent products. The firm states that it’s “going to leave opinionated reviews to the community and press” from now on.

Continue reading Kobold Press says sorry for dunking on DnD Dm’s guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD c
title: Kobold Press says sorry for dunking on DnD Dm’s guide
